<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.zorba-xquery.com/schemas/simple" targetNamespace="http://www.zorba-xquery.com/schemas/simple" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:element name="product" type="ProductType"/>
<xs:complexType name="ProductType"> <xs:attribute name="data" type="xs:base64Binary"/> <xs:attribute name="string" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType>
<xs:attribute name="zip-code" type="ZipType"/>
<xs:simpleType name="ZipType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
</xs:schema>
